name: Northwood Legacy
description:
My Granddad was a kind man, my parents took me to his house often, however, one day we left and never went back. It has been over 24 years and I just found out he's dead. So now I have to go back to England, back to that house and maybe I can find out the answer to that question I've had for all these years, what happened in 1997?

Northwood legacy is a story driven exploration game about searching your now deceased Granddads house and learning about his life and who he was.

The game will not hold your hand or tell you the information you have found, as such it is reccomended to use a pen and paper to write down notes and other information to help solve puzzles and piece the story together.

  • Solve puzzles
  • Read dozens of documents
  • Interact with and inspect over 150 objects in the house

This game was created in 97 hours over 18 days for the Senscape Adventurous Game jam.
